channel.title: leadership on TheDataAreClean
channel.description: Recent content in leadership on TheDataAreClean

item.title: Community Matters
item.description: __ For a while I have been wondering what constitutes being a leader, how do you differentiate a good one from a bad one, how do you even evaluate their contributions? Do you lead by example or by guidance? If being a leader means giving everyone the space to have a voice, does it also mean checking with everyone if they have something to say? Does any of this even matter if the only thing that anyone looks at is the final output?
